timeline.bodyText: Do we want to use Java serialization for Exceptions? I think serialization is considered more or less deprecated these days. What is the reason behind this?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
Throwable (the root of all exception) is Serialiazable - I just add the serialVersionUID as per SONAR complaint
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: Is there something like default binary operator? Shouldn't we rather throw an exception.
